mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_info (bi_wri_seq, bi_gr_seq, bi_title, bi_pb_name,bi_explain, bi_end_page) VALUES (#{bi_wri_seq}, #{bi_gr_seq}, #{bi_title}, #{bi_pb_name},#{bi_explain}, #{bi_end_page})

INSERT INTO library_db.book_cover_info (bc_img_file, bc_bi_seq, bc_is_poster) VALUES
(#{item.book_covers},#{seq},#{item.is_poster})

INSERT INTO book_content_info (bcon_page, bcon_text, bcon_bi_seq) VALUES
(#{item.order},#{item.content},#{seq})
INSERT INTO book_text_info (bt_bi_seq, bt_text_file, bt_reg_dt, bt_mod_dt) VALUES (#{seq}, #{text}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.select: select a.*,b.wri_name ,c.gr_name,d.bc_img_file from book_info a left outer join writer_info b on a.bi_wri_seq = b.wri_seq left outer join genre_info c on a.bi_gr_seq = c.gr_seq left outer join ( select * from book_cover_info where bc_is_poster =1 )d on a.bi_seq = d.bc_bi_seq where bi_title like '%${keyword}%' order by bi_reg_dt desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
select ceil(count(*)/10) from book_info where bi_title like '%${keyword}%'

select a.ar_seq ,a.ar_title ,c.bc_img_file from admin_recommend_books a inner join book_info b on a.ar_bi_seq = b.bi_seq inner join ( select * from book_cover_info where bc_is_poster = 1 )c on b.bi_seq = c.bc_bi_seq group by ar_title having ar_title like '%${keyword}%' order by ar_seq desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
select ceil(count(distinct(ar_title))/10) from admin_recommend_books where ar_title like '%${keyword}%'

select b.bi_seq ,b.bi_title ,c.bc_img_file ,d.wri_name from admin_recommend_books a inner join book_info b on a.ar_bi_seq = b.bi_seq left outer join ( select * from book_cover_info where bc_is_poster =1 ) c on b.bi_seq = c.bc_bi_seq left outer join writer_info d on b.bi_wri_seq = d.wri_seq where ar_title = #{title} group by bi_seq
select a.*,b.wri_name,c.gr_name from book_info a left outer join writer_info b on a.bi_wri_seq = b.wri_seq left outer join genre_info c on a.bi_gr_seq = c.gr_seq where bi_seq = #{seq}
select bcon_page as 'order', bcon_text as content from book_content_info where bcon_bi_seq = #{seq}
select bt_text_file from book_text_info where bt_bi_seq=#{seq}
select bc_seq as seq,bc_img_file as book_covers from book_cover_info where bc_bi_seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_cover_info (bc_img_file, bc_bi_seq, bc_is_poster) VALUES (#{book_covers}, #{seq}, 0)
mapper.select: select ceil(count(*)/10) from book_reply where bre_seq = #{seq}
